title: "Machine learning approach for differentiating cytomegalovirus esophagitis from herpes simplex virus esophagitis"
excerpt: "The endoscopic features between herpes simplex virus (HSV) and cytomegalovirus (CMV) esophagitis overlap significantly, and hence the differential diagnosis between HSV and CMV esophagitis is sometimes difficult."
